member.name: T:wslib.Security.PasswordHash
member.summary: Represents a hashed password with salt and iterations.

member.name: P:wslib.Security.PasswordHash.Iterations
member.summary: The iterations used for the hash

member.name: P:wslib.Security.PasswordHash.Salt
member.summary: The salt used for the hash

member.name: M:wslib.Security.PasswordHash.op_Equality(wslib.Security.PasswordHash,wslib.Security.PasswordHash)
member.summary: Compares two PasswordHash objects for equality.
member.returns: true if left has the same value as right; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:wslib.Security.PasswordHash.op_Inequality(wslib.Security.PasswordHash,wslib.Security.PasswordHash)
member.summary: Compares two PasswordHash objects for equality.
member.returns: true if left hasn't the same value as right; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:wslib.Security.PasswordHash.Equals(System.Object)
member.summary: Returns a value indicating whether this instance is equal to a specified wslib.Security.PasswordHash object.
member.param: A wslib.Security.PasswordHash value to compare to this instance.
member.returns: true if obj has the same value as this instance; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:wslib.Security.PasswordHash.GetHashCode
member.summary: Returns the hash code for this instance.
member.returns: A hash code for the current wslib.Security.PasswordHash.

member.name: T:wslib.Security.PBKDF2Service
member.summary: Implements Rfc2898DerivedBytes for hashing a password.

member.name: M:wslib.Security.PBKDF2Service.HashPassword(System.Security.SecureString)
member.summary: Generates a Hash(256bit) from an given password, an random generated Salt(256bit) and random generated iterations (Between 10K and 100K).
member.returns: The Hashed password with salt and iterations as struct PasswordHash

member.name: T:wslib.WPF.Core.ViewModelBase
member.summary: Base class of ViewModels. Implementing INotifyPropertyChanged.

member.name: E:wslib.WPF.Core.ViewModelBase.PropertyChanged
member.summary: Event that occors when a Property value changes.

member.name: M:wslib.WPF.Core.ViewModelBase.OnPropertyChanged(System.String)
member.summary: Invokes PropertyChanged event when it isn't null.
